TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpRequestWrapper extends System.Web.HttpRequestBase

summary.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that enables ASP.NET to read the HTTP values that are sent by a client during a Web request.

span.span: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that enables ASP.NET to read the HTTP values that are sent by a client during a Web request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別衍生自類別，並做為包裝函式類別。The class derives from the class and serves as a wrapper for the class. 這個類別會公開的功能類別並公開型別。This class exposes the functionality of the class and exposes the type. 類別可讓您取代的原始實作並用自訂的實作，例如，當您執行單元測試的 ASP.NET 管線外的應用程式中的類別。The class enables you to replace the original implementation of the class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.

summary.span: Forcibly terminates the underlying TCP connection, causing any outstanding I/O to fail.

span.span: Forcibly terminates the underlying TCP connection, causing any outstanding I/O to fail.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是安全執行緒。This method is thread-safe. 任何執行緒可以呼叫它在任何時間。Any thread may call it at any time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回目前執行的網頁處理常式的檔案路徑。The property returns the file path of the currently executing page handler. 當您將要求重新導向使用方法或方法，屬性傳回的路徑，重新導向的頁面 （子頁面）。When you redirect a request using either the method or the method, the property returns the path of the page that you are redirecting to (the child page).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法相當於不同之處在於它也會將讀取的位元組複製到內部存放裝置是由 ASP.NET 用來填入， ，和屬性。This method is identical to except that it also copies the bytes that are read to the internal storage that is used by ASP.NET to populate the , , and properties. 由於保留了這項資訊，ASP.NET Web Form 網頁 (.aspx 檔) 等下游程式碼將會成功執行。Because this information is preserved, downstream code such as ASP.NET Web Forms pages (.aspx files) will run successfully. 這不是使用 方法的情況。This is not the case with the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ValidateInput() cil managed

summary.span: Causes validation to occur for the collections that are accessed through the , , and properties.

span.span: Causes validation to occur for the collections that are accessed through the , , and properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別使用的輸入的驗證旗標來判斷是否要執行驗證，對要求的集合，可以透過存取， ，和屬性。The class uses input validation flags to determine whether to perform validation on the request collections that are accessed through the , , and properties. 方法設定這些旗標，因此，當`get`存取子， ，或叫用屬性，則會執行輸入的驗證。The method sets these flags so that when the `get` accessors of the , , or properties are invoked, input validation is performed. 驗證的運作方式是檢查所有的輸入的資料的硬式編碼有潛在危險的資料清單。Validation works by checking all input data against a hard-coded list of potentially dangerous data.
